news.title: samvo signs up to fifa's early warning system
news.content:
entertainment group added to list of those supporting
anti-corruption initiative in world football

 

london and zurich, 7 sept 2012:  global leisure and entertainment company samvo today pledged itself to a growing list of bookmakers that have committed to work with early warning system gmbh, a subsidiary of fifa to safeguard the integrity of the game of football.

early warning system gmbh (ews) was founded by fifa in 2005 with the aim to safeguard the integrity of football through prevention and early detection. the strategy of ews includes trustful cooperation with over 400 national and international sport betting organizations as well as with state authorities. furthermore, ews maintains its own technical monitoring system that allows the ews specialists to monitor movements and detect irregularities in the market of hundreds of international operating bookmakers. informal contacts within the global sport betting market complement the monitoring task. ews is not a commercial driven company and therefore not profit oriented. more information on www.fifa-ews.com.commenting on the agreement, samvo's general manager ms tang said, "like fifa, samvo is 100% committed to upholding the integrity of sport and takes a zero tolerance approach to any individuals or groups trying to manipulate football matches in order to perpetrate betting fraud. we are proud to join the ranks of socially responsible bookmakers that are now collaborating with ews and fifa to achieve this goal."

 

editors notes

 

about samvo

samvo is a global entertainment company that offers a full range of gaming and entertainment services, including popular online sportsbook www.samvo.com and betting cafes in london. samvo betbroker (www.samvobetbroker.com) has already established itself as one of the leading global destinations for professional sports punters, offering outstanding service, competitive prices and fast settlements. samvo holds gaming licenses from the agcc and the ukgc.

 

for more information, please contact:

jesper jensen

+44 20 3075 6600

jesper.jensen@samvogroup.com

news.title: samvo steps up to the online poker challenge
news.content:
samvo group has acquired new specialist marketing and promotions tools to take on the online poker industry.

samvo.com hosts its poker room on the highly respected microgaming poker network. in 2011, this network won the eGaming review b2b award for best poker network. by aligning itself with the microgaming network, samvo poker strives to bring its customers the best possible poker playing experience. 

for poker players, samvo poker will provide the most outstanding cash games, tournaments and player incentives on the market. the newly launched samvo affiliate programme is a blank canvas that provides affiliates with all the necessary tools to paint a lucrative and profitable picture.

samvo.com is forming alliances with marketing and promotion firms that will help them to build a successful brand. through great determination and aggressive promotion, samvo poker will meet the challenges of growing a reputable and top-notch poker room.

samvo group is a global entertainment and gaming company founded in 2004. the company holds gaming licenses from alderney, united kingdom and more. samvo group is at the forefront of online gaming technology. their gaming website samvo.com offers competitive prices in sports betting, poker and casino games.

# # #

contact for more information:
purplegob.com
samvo@purplegob.com

news.title: samvo welcomes jesper jensen
news.content:
samvo has appointed, everymatrix co-founder and industry professional, jesper jensen, as head of trading and sportsbook. a full article has been published on igaming business, to learn more about jesper, please click here:

http://www.igamingbusiness.com/content/samvo-appoints-new-head-trading-and-sportsbook

news.title: samvo set to start a revolution
news.content:
our very own david webb, retail development manager, has been featured in the latest winter 2011/2012 edition of sis tv's communicate magazine. find out more about our samvo betting cafes in the article by clicking the pdf version here (page 12):

http://www.sis.tv/sites/default/files/publication.pdf

news.title: temple of football opens in harrow
news.content:
betting provider bet90 holds introductory event 

harrow, 29th october 2011: it's all kicking off in harrow - bet90 celebrated the opening of its first shop in england under the slogan 'pure football'. each day from saturday, the football betting specialist will be showing up to twelve live matches at once on six big screens and will also be offering the popular 'live bet 0:0'. on the day of opening, bet90 invited customers to try out its services for free using 5GBP vouchers.

at 347-349 station road harrow everything will revolve around football. the betting provider bet90 opened the doors of its new shop on saturday and invited football fans to take a look at its range of betting services while enjoying snacks and drinks. guests were invited to place a bet while they were there - at no risk thanks to a 5GBP voucher.

measuring 250 sqm, the spacious shop has a lot to offer: football fans can follow their teams' matches on six big screens in the green and black bet90 surroundings, as up to twelve matches will be broadcast simultaneously. meanwhile, bets can be placed on up to 150 international football matches each day, with it being possible to combine up to 20 events. thanks to the popular 'live bet 0:0', bets can even be placed right up to the final whistle - so you'll be on the edge of your seat right to the end. bet90 has created a real 'temple of football' in its harrow-based shop - a mecca for true football fans.

bet90: 90 minutes of pure football
"our vision is to make betting as simple as possible while giving customers more time to enjoy the football match," says michael friedrich, founder of bet90, a professional gambler, who created the successful live 0:0 bet as early as 2005. it is now the market leader in over-the-counter business in germany. friedrich has created bet90 the way he expects a betting provider to be: a user-friendly, focussed range of betting services, coupled with the fastest odds updates and the highest winnings opportunities per betting slip. secure, simple, fast - that is bet90: 90 minutes of pure football.

officially licensed and founded on experience
the company is officially licensed as a betting provider by the lotteries & gaming authority (LGA) and is subject to its strict regulations and monitoring procedures. customers are also provided security in the form of bet90's internal quality surveillance. the management can draw on many years of betting expertise, and smooth processes are ensured behind the scenes by a team of developers and a large number of odds specialists. in total, more than 100 members of staff throughout europe and over 1500 match observers worldwide work together to ensure the quality of the odds - for secure, fast betting pleasure in the 'temple of football'

news.title: samvo ups the stakes in high street betting
news.content:
a stunning new betting brand launches today, challenging the current high street players and changing the face of uk bookmaking

 

london, 12th october 2011: a unique new style of high street betting is launched today with the arrival of the samvo betting cafe in both camden and hammersmith. designed to attract a younger, more affluent customer, the samvo betting cafe will become a destination for players looking for a relaxed, stylish environment thats a world away from the current high street offerings.

 

at the launch, samvo announced that as part of its social responsibility programme, it will be donating 5% of its net profit from the betting shop operations  to selected uk charities, as well as giving its customers an easy way to donate a percentage of their winnings. this radical step is part of a strategy to make gaming socially responsible by giving freedom and choice back to local communities.

 

samvo positions itself as a full service betting brand, managed and ran by a dynamic team of young high-fliers. with an average age of 28 and with alumni from leading schools and universities, samvo is reinventing betting both online and on the high street by offering outstanding prices, service and maximum limits on all markets. samvo is able to make this kind of low-margin, high-value offer due to its world class proprietary software and systems, and also promises to never turn away a winning customer.

 

"traditional betting outlets can be difficult places for casual and virgin gamblers to enter. we have tried to create an environment that feels as comfortable to a first time caller as to an experienced player. the samvo betting cafes are great places to spend time, enjoy watching sports and place a bet on a wide variety of events. we are hoping to grow the market by attracting new players as well as, obviously, enticing players away from our competitors," commented samvo senior marketing manager, david miller. he added, "being a boutique chain will allow us to shape the feedback of our customers to create a more personalised experience."

 

samvo is a global betting organisation founded in 2004 holding licenses from the alderney gaming commission, the united kingdom gaming commission and the curacao gaming commission. the organisation is headed by frank chan, a highly respected ex-investment banker educated in the uk and france.

 

the launch today was supported by hayley turner, the leading uk female jockey. turner, who has ridden 83 winners so far this season, has been enjoying the most successful spell of her career, riding her first two group one winners on dream ahead in the july cup and margot did at yorks ebor festival.

 

john mccririck also supported the launch today. his no-nonsense, opinionated approach to tipping has made him a popular figure in the world of racing whilst his attitudes to life and fashion have also brought him notoriety away from the racecourse. 

 

about samvo

in addition to the samvo betting cafes, the company also operates www.samvo.com, a growing online gambling site that offers sports betting - with particularly attractive prices on handicap betting - and casino games. it is currently undergoing a major overhaul and will re-launch in 2012 with an improved ui and exciting new products. www.samvobetbroker.com  has already established itself as one of the leading global destinations for professional punters, offering outstanding service, prices and settlements.

 

for more information, please contact jesper jensen at samvo (jesper.jensen@samvogroup.com) +44 (0) 20 8991 3650, or dean barrett at bastion (dean@bastion.co.uk) +44 (0) 20 7269 7900.

www.samvogroup.com

news.title: hello camden high street!
news.content:
last week saw the opening of our very first samvo betting cafe in hammersmith, this week we did it all over again in camden! situated along the bustling high street, we are thrilled to annouce the opening of our second samvo betting cafe which launched on 5 September, 2011.

similar to the location in hammersmith, the samvo betting cafe in camden also features a stylish interior decked out with plasma screens airing live sports and prices, fobt machines, touch-screen racing post terminals and a selection of beverages and snacks. we welcome you to our samvo betting cafe where we have proudly reinvented the high street betting experience. 

see the surroundings and visit the smiling camden team at 160 camden high street, camden, london, nw1 0ne.

one another exciting note: the next milestone for the retail development team is the launch of a joint project with bet90 in harrow, due to open later on this month.

news.title: samvo betting cafe now open in hammersmith!
news.content:
unlike any other betting shop in the world, the very first samvo betting cafe opened its doors on 27 august, 2011 in hammersmith.  revitalising and reinventing the typical uk high street betting shop, our new betting cafe concept has been designed for the modern customer in mind.

think art gallery chic with high-tech gadgetry, the new samvo betting cafe features a stylish interior with comfortable seating, plasma screens airing live sports  and prices, sparkling new fobt machines, touch-screen racing post terminals as well as a selection of beverages and snacks. 

the friendly staff members at the betting cafe are highly trained and are willing to help all customers  whether or not they want to place a bet.  we are thrilled to show-off our samvo betting cafe in style.  stay tuned, the samvo betting cafe in camden is due to open very soon. 

check our new look, come and see us!

109 king street, hammersmith, w6 9jg.

news.title: champions of the igaming football league 2011
news.content:
we are very proud to announce that super samvo are the champions of the igaming football league! our season record finished with 5 wins, 1 loss and 1 draw. it was an amazing season. Our only defeat was against unibet (0-2) earlier in the season. we faced them again in the final game and won with a fantastic 3-1 victory! All of the team members deserve high accolades as it was a combination of their supreme skills, dedication and sportsmanship, which won them the tournament.

it is official: super samvo are champions!

to view the final fixtures, please click here

news.title: introducing super samvo
news.content: it is official, super samvo fc has been born. this season, super samvo will take part in igaming football league 5-a-side football tournament. operators, affiliates and vendors are set to compete for the glory of being the best football team in the industry. with our squad reaching as many as 20 players, there is no doubt that it is going to be a great season. team managers include richard allen, sam fleming and david webb. for more information on super samvo and the fixtures, visit www.igamingfootballleague.com. come on super samvo!

news.title: exciting changes to samvobetbroker.com
news.content:
as samvo continues to innovate its business, no stone will be left unturned. when it comes our consumer and b2b touch-points, everything we publish from now on will embody the personality of our company:
a bold and eclectic innovator that reinvents the categories it enters in fresh and enriching ways. a company that creates icons of contemporary lifestyle for uncompromising experience seekers.

you have already seen the new corporate site and in january 2011 you will see a completely new site for our sister company, samvo betbroker
 ( www.samvobetbroker.com )

these new sites are strong, sharp and stylish.

they embody the personality of our company.

and now we have an identity that truly reflects that.

from david miller, senior marketing manager

news.title: welcome to samvo!
news.content: hi all and welcome to the new samvo corporate website! please take a few minutes to have a look around - it's rather nice and we're extremely proud of it. samvo has chosen 2011 as the year it will accelerate its business into the mainstream. it marks the culmination of several years of hard work by a team of very passionate and dedicated individuals and this site is the first of many exciting new touch-points that will be revealed. over the coming weeks and months you will see the innovations we have made to our business - and we believe - to the igaming sector. the next generation of online entertainment starts here!

the purpose of the facilities administrator position is to deliver a high quality service to internal users and office staff. you will be a point of contact for the internal customer with any queries. previous facilities experience is needed.
 
the main tasks / responsibilities
the successful candidate will be responsible for:

  • acting as first point of contact for all building queries and logging appropriately

  • enforcing the internal office security policies and procedures

  • supporting the reception service and operating the switchboard, filtering calls appropriately

  • issuing of security passes / activating and deactivating

  • assisting and supporting any moves, including space planning

  • responsible for creating and maintaining an asset register for all furniture and equipment

  • maintaining accurate filing system

  • negotiating with external service providers for maintenance services, materials and repairs

  • dealing with contractors / engineers and overseeing works as directed

  • assisting the facilities coordinator with all purchasing

  • overseeing cleaning staff

  • arranging set-up for new joiners

  • raising payment requisitions

  • assisting with the management of health and safety

  • completing risk assessments

  • investigating and reporting accidents and incidents

  • assisting to arrange staff events (charity initiatives, company parties, monthly meetings)

  • supporting the facilities coordinator as and when required

  • supporting the directors in both uk and hong kong as and when required

  • any ad hoc projects that may arise

professional expertise

  • experience in a facilities related role

  • health and safety knowledge preferred

  • excellent telephone manner and customer care skills

  • the ability to communicate effectively at all levels, building a positive and effective working relationship and rapport both face to face and over the telephone

  • business writing and administrative experience

  • confident and reliable working attitude

  • ability to prioritise own workload and work to tight time-scales

  • ability to work independently and as part of the team

  • good working knowledge of microsoft office, especially microsoft excel, outlook and sharepoint

additional requirements
the successful applicant will be a pro-active, organised, facilities focussed individual with a can-do attitude, and willing to work on a shift basis covering any 5 days from 7

purpose
the candidate will be responsible for ensuring first line support to the finance team over a maternity period. you will be working in a highly pressurized environment, hence you need to be highly organized with the ability to multi-task, problem solve and prioritize your work.
 
the main tasks / responsibilities
 
the main responsibilities are detailed below. this job specification should not be construed to imply that these requirements are the exclusive standards of the position. incumbents will follow any other instructions, and perform any other related duties, as may be required by their line manager.

  • monitor daily accounting functions

  • prepare monthly management reports, including interpretation of results for management meeting

  • perform financial analysis for evaluation and monitoring of business performance

  • perform budgeting and investigate and provide analysis of variances against budgets

  • prepare annual financial statements of group companies

  • supporting initiatives to improve profitability and productivity

  • manage and training of finance staff

  • prepare kpi and other data reports

  • handle other ad-hoc assignments

professional expertise
it is essential that the post holder:-

  • possesses a degree in accounting or relevant qualification

  • possesses professional qualification such as aca, acca or equivalent

knowledge, skills and experience
it is essential that the post holder:-

  • has minimum of 5 years’ relevant work experience in preparing financial statements and financial analysis

  • has experience in setting up and implementing accounting systems, processes and procedures

  • has sound knowledge in uk gaap, ifrs and cost accounting

  • is detail oriented, independent and highly self-initiating

  • has strong analytical and problem-solving skills

  • able to work under tight timelines

  • is a good team player with excellent interpersonal, presentation and communication skills

  • has good command of spoken and written english

it is desirable that the post holder:-

  • has previous experience in gambling/gaming industry

purpose of job
this is a busy and challenging role, which requires a diplomatic individual with good skills, knowledge in accounting and excellent attention to detail, for managing accounts and maintaining good customer relationships. you will be working in a highly pressurized environment, hence you need to be highly organized with the ability to multi-task, solve problems and prioritize your workload
 
the main tasks / responsibilities
the main responsibilities will be to:

  • maintain budgets, cash flow forecasts and other accounting records

  • monitors accounting systems to determine accounts are being maintained effectively and manage and process settlement transactions

  • liaises and manage clients relationships to ensure payments are made in line with client agreements

  • prepare various monthly and year end accounts and transaction report for various clients groups and managers

  • prepare and produce weekly statements for various client groups and ensures invoices and payments are processed accurately and within a timely manner

  • other ad-hoc duties as and when required by the management

professional expertise
it is essential that the post holder:

  • possess a master’s degree qualification in finance/accounting

  • is excellent in data entry accuracy and attention to details

  • able to work independently and on own initiative

  • is proficient in microsoft excel

  • is organized and responsible

it is desirable that the post holder:

  • has settlement experience in banking and finance sectors

  • has gaming experience though not essential

knowledge, skills and experience
it is essential that the post holder:

  • works in a methodical manner

  • is an analytical thinker with strong numerical skills

  • has good oral and written communication skills

  • has the ability to prioritize their workload and work under pressure to meet tight deadlines

  • has a natural desire to succeed

  • possesses sound reporting and analytical skills

  • must be trustworthy

  • is able to work independently and as part of a team on assigned projects

  • must have a good command of cantonese, mandarin and english

additional requirements
this is an ideal opportunity to start a career in the gaming industry and the ideal time put your accounting and financial acumen to good use. working in a fast paced 24/7 business will require you to work on a shift pattern covering any 5 days from 7. the earliest start time will be 7 am and the latest finish time will be 10 pm.

responsibilities:

 

  • serves as the conduit, through which requirements flow, between the internal and external customer community, the software development team, and project managers

  • elicit requirement using interviews, document analysis, workshops, surveys, site visits, business process descriptions, and workflow analysis

  • critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources and reconcile conflicts

  • decompose high-level information into details and abstract low-level information into a general understanding

  • helps to develops product strategies/ roadmap/ functional specification for client engagements

  • distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs and assumption

  • lead testing efforts when project requires

requirements:

  • degree holder in information technology, business administration (preferably in information management) discipline or equivalent

  • at least 4 years working experience in e-commerce

  • solid product development experience in web or mobile based products or services

  • hands on experience in uml techniques such as use case, bpmn diagrams to facilitate requirement specifications tasks

  • strong business sense and logic, sensitive to current and upcoming industries, business trends and technologies

  • ability to work independently in a high-pressure, deadline-driven environment which demands quick thinking and a problem-solving approach

  • positive attitude and a good team player

  • frequent travel to shenzhen is needed

  • excellent levels of communication in english, both written and verbal

  • familiarity with edi, eft, xml transaction processing, and data mapping is a plus

  • familiarity or knowledge of internet communication protocols is a plus

  • familiarity or knowledge of i-gaming is a plus

candidates with less experiences will be considered as assistant business analyst.

we offer good career opportunities and a competitive compensation package including 5-day work week, medical benefit scheme and performance bonus to the successful candidate. interested applicants: please send a detailed resume with your current and expected salary and date of availability to recruithk@samvogroup.com. please enter "attention of human resources manager" in the email subject.

responsibilities:

 

  • design, create and maintain highly available oracle database clusters and mysql

  • perform database tasks such as schema design, performance tuning, capacity planning, backups monitoring, maintenance, trouble shooting, and change control activities

  • implement data models, create database tables, indexes, triggers, views, and stored procedures to support new and existing applications

  • design and implementing incremental and full backup policies and procedures

  • install software and maintain upgrades and patches

  • facilitate root cause analysis on database issues

  • create testing and uat environment

  • manage security of application access to databases

  • service continuity and dr

  • setup, monitor, and maintain disaster recovery solutions for production databases

  • supporting business application development teams while providing guidance and best practice solutions

  • monitoring database size and performance, tuning sql queries, developing prototypes to demonstrate proposed functionality, produce support documentation, and provide production support

  • perform benchmarking analysis to properly size hardware platforms, and maintain technical documentation relating to database management

  • regular database capacity planning related to database growth and system utilization, trend analysis and predicting future database resource requirements

requirements:

 

  • higher diploma or degree in computer engineering/science or equivalent

  • thorough knowledge of oracle rdbms 10g/11g, mysql environments

  • strong troubleshooting skills within and outside database environment

  • 3+ years in database administration/support in oracle rdbms 10g/11g, mysql in 24x7 production environment

  • strong oracle database troubleshooting skills in mission critical environment

  • strong knowledge of oracle database tuning and using awr

  • demonstrated, in-depth knowledge of database internals and data structures

  • strong knowledge of sql/sql*plus and strong understanding of pl/sql and stored procedures/pkgs

  • strong knowledge of data guard and oracle grid for 11g

  • strong knowledge of unix shell or perl scripting languages

  • quick learner and strong listening and communication skills

  • proficient in spoken and written english

  • knowledge of ms sql server a plus

  • proficient in mandarin a plus

we offer good career opportunities and a competitive compensation package including 5-day work week, medical benefit scheme and performance bonus to the successful candidate. interested applicants: please send a detailed resume with your current and expected salary and date of availability to recruithk@samvogroup.com. please enter "attention of human resources manager" in the email subject.

responsibilities:

 

  • responsible for overall system architecture design, system integration and implementation strategies of distributed systems of the company

  • demonstrate expert knowledge of technical design alternatives by guiding the development team in overall application design activities

  • development of an excellent technical understanding of architectures and component technologies that may be utilized or further developed to form a strategic solution for the company

  • technical strategic planning in line with commercial and marketing goals to achieve a sustainable, competitive market solution

  • provide technology leadership and mentoring to technical team

requirements:

 

  • university graduate in computer science or related disciplines

  • 9+ years’ experience in software industry and at least 4 years on distributed system architecture infrastructure

  • familiar with distributed system technology including soa, j2ee and xml is a must

  • strong database design and development experience, such as oracle and mysql

  • thorough understanding of the security and performance implications associated with web technologies

  • solid communication skills in spoken and written english and chinese

  • strong analytical, problem-solving and interpersonal skills

  • able to work independently and under pressure

  • experienced in online and computer gaming industry would be a definite advantage

we offer good career opportunities and a competitive compensation package including 5-day work week, medical benefit scheme and performance bonus to the successful candidate. interested applicants: please send a detailed resume with your current and expected salary and date of availability to recruithk@samvogroup.com. please enter "attention of human resources manager" in the email subject.

responsibilities:

  • record and resolve customer interactions via live chat, email and telephone, resolve issues according to the correct escalation procedures

  • respond to customer enquires in a polite, professional and timely manner

  • take ownership of customer queries, resolving any outstanding issues, providing a one-stop-shop solution

  • offer a service that positively promotes the business and the brand with customer retention at the forefront of the mind

  • support the customer in overcoming any obstacles or hurdles that may prevent them from using our services, upselling and cross-selling products where possible

  • manage and maintain existing customer base, promote product releases to existing clients via a number of different outbound communication channels

  • manage work load effectively to deliver to department slas

  • build working relationships between other team members, management and external departments

  • working alongside the business constantly looking for ways to develop its products and services, reporting and recording customer feedback to management

  • work alongside the marketing team to help build the brand and increase existing customer base

requirements:

  • this candidate must be fluent in chinese and malaysian or indonesian

  • excellent telephone manner and positive attitude

  • is an analytical thinker with strong numerical skills

  • self-motivated and sales orientated, able to work independently

  • good customer service background

  • basic knowledge of online money processing

  • previous call centre customer service experience

  • interest and knowledge in sports and betting preferred, but not essential

we offer good career opportunities and a competitive compensation package including 5-day work week, medical benefit scheme and performance bonus to the successful candidate. interested applicants: please send a detailed resume with your current and expected salary and date of availability to recruituk@samvogroup.com. please enter "attention of human resources manager" in the email subject.

responsibilities:

 

  • manage accounts and process customers' settlement transactions

  • maintain relationships with agents, customers and third party suppliers in asia

  • prepare daily/weekly/monthly end/year end client accounts reports and transaction reports

  • prepare and produce weekly statements for clients

  • closely monitor the level of customers' debts

  • handle customers' agreements

  • monitor fraud activity with a view to prevention

  • other ad-hoc duties as and when required by the management

requirements:

  • excellent in data entry accuracy and attention to details

  • able to work independently and on own initiative, organised and responsible

  • proficient in microsoft excel

  • has a minimum of 1 year experience within the gaming or online payments sector

  • works in a methodical manner

  • is an analytical thinker with strong numerical skills

  • has good oral and written communication skills

  • has the ability to prioritise their workload and work under pressure to meet tight deadlines

  • has a natural desire to succeed

  • possesses sound reporting and analytical skills

  • must be trustworthy

  • is able to work independently and as part of a team on assigned projects

  • has good command of cantonese and mandarin

we offer good career opportunities and a competitive compensation package including 5-day work week, medical benefit scheme and performance bonus to the successful candidate. interested applicants: please send a detailed resume with your current and expected salary and date of availability to recruituk@samvogroup.com. please enter "attention of human resources manager" in the email subject.

retail staff required


this is a fantastic opportunity for dynamic and well-presented retail assistants, who have a keen interest in online gaming or sports entertainment.

are you...?

  • well-presented and well-groomed

  • keenly customer-focused

  • interested in the online gaming or gambling sector

  • dynamic and innovative

  • diligent and have an honest work ethic....

if so...

we are looking for a number of full-time or part-time retail assistants with customer service and cash handling experience to work in our newly appointed flagship stores. full training will be provided, however previous betting shop experience would be beneficial.

interviews will be held locally and positions are available immediately.

if you are interested please apply below

the purpose of this role will be to design and implement quantitative applications that support critical business processes. we look for highly motivated candidates with a passion for excellence and a desire to use technology to solve critical business problems. Technologists at the quant team are ambitious, innovative and committed to client service and, by working in close partnership with both internal and external clients, exemplify the collaborative, team-driven environment that is the core part of Samvo quant team's culture.


the successful candidate will be responsible for:

  • implementing mathematical models for company products and business processes

  • developing and enhancing in house applications for trading

  • liaising with quantitative analysts and other team members including other developers and quantitative assistants to maintain and understand user requirements

  • work with quant assistants and other internal users and stakeholders on the testing and delivery of applications

  • participate in the full development lifecycle

the successful candidate will possess:

  • a postgraduate degree in computer science, mathematics or engineer related subjects with up to 2 years commercial experience

  • strong database techniques

  • knowledge of matlab or modelling and statistical packages is also relevant

  • passion about technology

  • solid communication skills

  • self-motivation and willingness to work in an energetic, fast paced and team oriented development environment

in return, we believe that the samvo quant team can offer career opportunity that is unique to the right candidate.

samvo quant team is a meritocracy. In the quant team, your ability to contribute to the performance of the team will help determine your success. you will work in a positive and supportive environment with a real and substantial role to play from day one. you will be challenged and stimulated and given the opportunity to contribute to the development of creative and commercial solutions.

you will be in the company of people like you: people with intellect, talent, entrepreneurial spirit, drive and vision.

the quant team supports or are directly involved in many key business areas from market making, proprietary trading to data modelling, business analysis and product design. if you choose to contribute, you will work in a fast-paced, high-energy environment with people whose skills and backgrounds go beyond business.

the candidate will be responsible for serving the company's vip customers, whilst at the same time developing the business together with the team. we are looking for a highly organised and intelligent individual with excellent communication skills to reflect our prestigious client base.


the main tasks / responsibilities:
the ability to run and develop your existing business by liaising and serving vip customers in an efficient manner

  • account management – with customers and existing asian business partners

  • hedging & trading duties

  • data entry

  • assisting with trading figures

  • business figure analysis

  • maintenance of website contents

  • devise promotional and marketing plan

professional expertise:
it is essential that the post holder:

  • is degree educated in finance, accounting, economics or other mathematics related degree

  • fluent in written and spoken cantonese, mandarin and english

knowledge, skills and experience:

  • sharp negotiator with the ability to think fast

  • proactive, enthusiastic performance driven

  • a self motivated and target driven self-starter

  • customer focused

  • good numerical abilities and a head for figures

  • has minimum education level of undergraduate

  • has the ability to work under pressure and handle responsibilities

  • has vast interests in sports especially football

  • has advanced knowledge ms office especially excel

  • experience in the betting industry especially knowledge of asian handicap betting markets is desirable

  • must be flexible as weekend and evening work will be mandatory

in return we provide:

  • career progression

  • bespoke training and development programmes

  • an excellent environment to learn and develop
